channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Elon Musk's X sues Lego, Nestlé and more brands, accusing them of advertising boycott
item.description: The new defendants added into the legal filing included Lego, Nestlé, Tyson Foods, Abbott Laboratories, Colgate-Palmolive, Pinterest and Shell International.
item.content:encoded:
The new defendants added into the legal filing included Lego, Nestlé, Tyson Foods, Abbott Laboratories, Colgate-Palmolive, Pinterest and Shell International.

(Image credit: Al Drago)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Trump imposes new tariffs on imports from Mexico, Canada and China in new phase of trade war
item.description: Starting Tuesday, nearly all imports from Canada and Mexico will be charged a 25% tariff, while goods from China will be charged a 10% tariff.
item.content:encoded:
Starting Tuesday, nearly all imports from Canada and Mexico will be charged a 25% tariff, while goods from China will be charged a 10% tariff.

(Image credit: Alfredo Estrella)
item.dc:creator: Scott Horsley

item.title: NPR reporters discuss covering the LA wildfires
item.dc:creator: Noah Caldwell

item.title: Third Black Hawk crew member involved in deadly crash near DC airport identified
item.description: The Army released the identity of the third crew member aboard the Black Hawk helicopter involved in the deadly airport crash near DCA as Capt. Rebecca Lobach, an aviation officer and past ROTC cadet.
item.content:encoded:
The Army released the identity of the third crew member aboard the Black Hawk helicopter involved in the deadly airport crash near DCA as Capt. Rebecca Lobach, an aviation officer and past ROTC cadet.

(Image credit: Samantha Brown)
item.dc:creator: Tom Bowman

item.title: Trump says airstrikes on ISIS in Somalia killed terrorists without 'harming civilians'
item.description: In a Truth Social post Saturday, President Trump announced successful precision airstrikes on the "Senior ISIS Attack Planner," though didn't provide a name for that individual.
item.content:encoded:
In a Truth Social post Saturday, President Trump announced successful precision airstrikes on the "Senior ISIS Attack Planner," though didn't provide a name for that individual.

(Image credit: AP)
item.dc:creator: Deepa Shivaram

item.title: Investigators search for black box from small plane that crashed in Philadelphia
item.description: NTSB chair Jennifer Homendy said authorities can still complete their investigation without the recording device, but it is a critical piece and its location remains "the biggest question right now."
item.content:encoded:
NTSB chair Jennifer Homendy said authorities can still complete their investigation without the recording device, but it is a critical piece and its location remains "the biggest question right now."

(Image credit: Matt Rourke)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Trump fires chief of the federal consumer watchdog agency
item.description: Rohit Chopra had led the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau since 2021. Consumer groups praised his leadership, while Republicans have frequently attacked the agency.
item.content:encoded:
Rohit Chopra had led the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau since 2021. Consumer groups praised his leadership, while Republicans have frequently attacked the agency.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Laurel Wamsley

item.title: The Democratic Party votes for new leadership, choosing Minnesota's Ken Martin as chair
item.description: Without control of the White House or Congress, the new DNC chair, Minnesota's Ken Martin, will lead a Democratic Party that is still figuring out its future after a bruising election.
item.content:encoded:
Without control of the White House or Congress, the new DNC chair, Minnesota's Ken Martin, will lead a Democratic Party that is still figuring out its future after a bruising election.

(Image credit: Brynn Anderson)
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: As Trump vows to embrace fossil fuels, U.S. climate policy won't change quickly
item.description: President Trump's first weeks in office included executive orders that aim to stop or roll back former President Biden's ambitious climate agenda and redirect the country's attention to fossil fuels.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump's first weeks in office included executive orders that aim to stop or roll back former President Biden's ambitious climate agenda and redirect the country's attention to fossil fuels.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: Jeff Brady

item.title: Prices were a key issue in 2024, but Trump makes clear they're not his top priority
item.description: While prices and the economy were top issues during the campaign, President Trump is making clear that other issues — most notably immigration — are his main focus at the start of his second term.
item.content:encoded:
While prices and the economy were top issues during the campaign, President Trump is making clear that other issues — most notably immigration — are his main focus at the start of his second term.

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro
